{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3694385,"name":"","username":"ElectricTurtle","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/electricturtle/{size}/260014_2.png","created_at":"2025-07-30T20:59:43.913Z","cooked":"

Hi! with the season over, I really want to see some of the controller layouts for all the amzing teams out there! Our layout this year was, not ideal, so I want to experment with diffrent layouts during our offseason, thanks!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2025-07-30T20:59:43.913Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":34,"reads":417,"readers_count":416,"score":298.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":504821,"topic_slug":"share-your-reefscape-controller-layout","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":73261,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/share-your-reefscape-controller-layout/504821/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3694397,"name":"Ezra","username":"Strflightmight","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/strflightmight/{size}/261969_2.png","created_at":"2025-07-30T21:26:01.539Z","cooked":"

We used the following layout with some very minor tweaks throughout the whole season so that our driver wouldn’t accidentally get confused with some new keybind:

Old Layout1600×1006 69.7 KB

After the season however we edited some things and these are likely the revised controls that we’ll be running for the off-season

New Layout1779×1118 94.6 KB

Important to note that we also use a keyboard for the operator controls, which are mostly just for backup or debugging certain problems that can occur mid match and are not primarily for main robot functions.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2025-07-30T21:26:12.229Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":402,"readers_count":401,"score":170.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":504821,"topic_slug":"share-your-reefscape-controller-layout","display_username":"Ezra","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":62434,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5990 | Programmer, Electronics Lead, and Driver"},"post_url":"/t/share-your-reefscape-controller-layout/504821/2","custom_user_title":"5990 | Programmer, Electronics Lead, and Driver","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":5}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3694463,"name":"Ashton A","username":"UHDbits","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/u/a5b964/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-07-30T21:52:31.814Z","cooked":"

Are your back paddles mapped to other buttons on the controller, or do they function as their own buttons? We’ve tried two different controllers in DInput mode and we either haven’t gotten the triggers to work on analog mode, or have some other bugs that prevented us from using them, so we just map the back paddles to something like the d-pad in XInput mode.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2025-07-30T21:53:11.597Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":348,"readers_count":347,"score":89.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":504821,"topic_slug":"share-your-reefscape-controller-layout","display_username":"Ashton A","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":62434,"username":"Strflightmight","name":"Ezra","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/strflightmight/{size}/261969_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63823,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1165 - Lead Programmer/Driver"},"post_url":"/t/share-your-reefscape-controller-layout/504821/3","custom_user_title":"1165 - Lead Programmer/Driver","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3694611,"name":"Zach","username":"zachmck16","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/zachmck16/{size}/177602_2.png","created_at":"2025-07-30T22:21:31.947Z","cooked":"

Forgive the poor picture. We added some graphics later.

First time making a button board which was made to compliment our autonomous tele-op movement.

IMG_3402750×1000 209 KB

-The circle was each score-able position.
-Top left are the 3 location to score in barge.
-Middle left set the level of the reef we wanted to score.
-lower left and right are the HP stations
-the 6 buttons on the left include 2 set points for algae pick up and 4 other options I don’t remember. I believe they were mostly overrides or open.

Great programming challenge lead to a fun electrical project.

Best aspect by far is it’s a great outreach bot. Anyone can drive/score with this including my 3 and 5 old.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2025-07-30T22:21:31.947Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":340,"readers_count":339,"score":138.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":504821,"topic_slug":"share-your-reefscape-controller-layout","display_username":"Zach","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":52593,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4272 Lead Mentor, Teacher Sponsor, former drive coach"},"post_url":"/t/share-your-reefscape-controller-layout/504821/4","custom_user_title":"4272 Lead Mentor, Teacher Sponsor, former drive coach","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3694623,"name":"","username":"AF1714","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/af1714/{size}/198759_2.png","created_at":"2025-07-30T22:35:16.495Z","cooked":"

We ran with one driver this year in order to reap the benefits of having a second drive coach or, even better, two human players. I’ll summarize what we came up with here, but you can getter a better visual on the site we used to make the layout: PadCrafter: Control Scheme Builder

(Note: Our elevators default position is Lvl 2 on the reef so we dont have a button for it, we score Lvl 1 from that position too.)

L-Stick: Translate
R-Stick: Rotate
L-Stick Press: High Reef Algae
R-Stick Press: Low Reef Algae
Y: Lvl 4
X: Lvl 3
B: Outake Algae
A: Algae Ground Intake
LB: Auto Align Left Reef Pole
RB: Auto Align Right Reef Pole
LT: Intake Coral
RT: Score Coral
Select: Re-zero Gyro
Start: Once for prep climb, a second time to actually climb

I don’t have any photos of the final controller but this was the near final overall layout. We laser burned another piece of wood to label the reef locations.

We map them to the stick buttons and +/-. I did a bunch of research earlier in the season and unfortunately couldn’t find any controllers with unique back buttons

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2025-07-30T23:05:20.985Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":273,"readers_count":272,"score":119.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":504821,"topic_slug":"share-your-reefscape-controller-layout","display_username":"Ezra","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":63823,"username":"UHDbits","name":"Ashton A","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/u/a5b964/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":62434,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5990 | Programmer, Electronics Lead, and Driver"},"post_url":"/t/share-your-reefscape-controller-layout/504821/8","custom_user_title":"5990 | Programmer, Electronics Lead, and Driver","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3694703,"name":"Aidan","username":"FieryFuryGame","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fieryfurygame/{size}/262141_2.png","created_at":"2025-07-30T23:26:42.033Z","cooked":"

We had two drivers, though we could probably do with just one if needed. Our auto-alignment never worked correctly in season, so our driver stuck to manual alignment for most of our matches.

Driver:
Left Stick - Translate
Right Stick - Rotate
Left Bumper - Align To Reef Left
Right Bumper - Align To Reef Right
A - Zero Gyro (mainly for debugging)
X - Cancel All Commands (intended for if the auto-align system we had went haywire for no reason)

Operator:
Left Trigger - Manual Elevator Down
Right Trigger - Manual Elevator Up
D-Pad Down - Elevator To Ground
D-Pad Left - Elevator To L2
D-Pad Up - Elevator To L3
D-Pad Right - Elevator To L4
A - Intake Coral
X - Intake Algae
B - Eject
Y - Toggle Effector Pivot Position

Over offseason, we’re redoing controls to be a lot nicer for both drivers. (And a working auto-alignment system, for that matter)

image1159×869 130 KB

Various labels added later. And stickers. My favorite is one with a Screaming Possum. Some years we have a non operative button that says something like Skynet Activation, but they played it straight this time around.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2025-07-31T00:12:09.120Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":236,"readers_count":235,"score":57.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":504821,"topic_slug":"share-your-reefscape-controller-layout","display_username":"Sam Geckler","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":21515,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/share-your-reefscape-controller-layout/504821/12","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3694893,"name":"Owen Tharp","username":"Grumpy_Bud","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/e274bd/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-07-31T01:20:10.310Z","cooked":"

Screenshot_2025-07-18_at_4.47.32_PM2538×1166 239 KB

Pretty simple, all of our algae actions are one button based off position and whether or not we have an algae yet. You select a level on the dpad and right trigger to score coral. Everything else is pretty self explanatory

Controller layout2956×1270 229 KB

This is the main driver controller layout, which mostly controls manual movement to the coral station and preferred reef face to score on, as well as our robot’s “Dale” mechanism - the dealgaenator(a little arm on the elevator with a wheel to remove algae from the reef). The codriver had a custom control board(picture below) with buttons for autoscore for the left/right branch on the closest reef face at L1-L4, as well as some backup manual override buttons at the bottom.

Custom control board1920×1280 214 KB
